NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to TV Shows and Diversity or the cell corresponding to Travel and Preservation?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Travel} and {Preservation} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Gaming and Critique or the cell corresponding to TV Shows and Localization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {TV Shows} and {Localization} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Social Media and Accessibility or the cell corresponding to Movies and Preservation?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Movies} and {Preservation} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Social Media and Diversity or the cell corresponding to Music and Popularity?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Social Media} and {Diversity} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.69 to 0.77?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Movies, Adoption), (Fashion, Critique), (Social Media, Critique), (Gaming, Diversity), (TV Shows, Diversity), (Movies, Globalization), (Music, Localization)}.
